**Example 1: 示例**



Input: 

```
tccli dsgc CreateDSPACosMetaResources --cli-unfold-argument  \
    --Buckets 123-251007922 bowen-1234567890-251007922 bowen1test-251007922 dfdd-251007922 dspa-automated-251007922 dspa-test-xs-251007922 test-dspa-251007922 testgz-251007922 \
    --DspaId dspa-6fb60936 \
    --ResourceRegion ap-guangzhou
```

Output: 
```
{
    "Response": {
        "RequestId": "36444cd8-e5b0-458f-a18b-75deef13e2bd"
    }
}
```
